mainEntity.name: What is the Toyota Supra MK4 price in India?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Toyota Supra MK4 price in India ranges from â‚¹85-95 lakhs for well-maintained imported examples. Prices vary based on condition, modifications, and import duties.

mainEntity.name: What is the Supra MK4 0-100 km/h time?

acceptedAnswer.text: The stock Toyota Supra MK4 with twin-turbo engine achieves 0-100 km/h in 4.6 seconds. Modified versions can achieve times under 4 seconds depending on power output.

mainEntity.name: What are the Supra MK4 engine specs?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Supra MK4 features the legendary 2JZ-GTE engine: 3.0L inline-6 twin-turbo, producing 320hp and 315 lb-ft stock, capable of reliably handling 800+ hp with modifications.

mainEntity.name: What are popular Supra MK4 modifications?

acceptedAnswer.text: Popular Supra MK4 mods include: single turbo conversion, ECU tune, upgraded fuel injectors, forged internals, improved intercooler, and exhaust system upgrades. The 2JZ engine can handle 800-1200hp with proper supporting mods.
